Classes in gameutils used by gameutils
Art
          A class that stores Images.
Game
          Game is the main class that must be extended by the user.
Input
          Handles key, mouse, and mouse motion input.
InputListener
          An all-in-one class that has all the basic input methods.
MenuPage
          A MenuPage is a Screen that holds and organizes a set of Widgets.
Menus
          Menus organizes a group of MenuPages.
Screen
          A Screen is a game state.
Sound
          A class that stores sound clips.
